entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as a character who doesn't know what's hidden under the loose floorboard upstairs. She has no idea that Harry is not following the diet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who is expected to survive the summer on carrot sticks but instead receives help from his friends.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who returns with sugar-free snacks from Hermione's house.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a character whose parents are dentists and sends sugar-free snacks to Harry through Hedwig.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the Hogwarts gamekeeper who sends rock cakes to Harry but Harry doesn't eat them due to Hagrid's cooking experience.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as a character who sends an enormous fruitcake and assorted meat pies to Harry through Errol the owl.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is Mrs. Weasley's family owl who needs five days to recover from delivering the food to Harry.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as a family that doesn't celebrate Harry's birthday.

relationships.description: Harry sends Hedwig to his friends for help.
Hedwig visits Hermione's house and returns with sugar-free snacks.
Hagrid sends rock cakes to Harry.
Mrs. Weasley sends food through Errol the owl.
Harry's birthday is not celebrated with his Dursley family.
